summary: Comprehensive testing of CoinHubX crypto exchange platform completed. Backend APIs working at 87.5% success rate. Frontend UI excellent with professional design. Critical ObjectId serialization issue identified causing error pages. Login, portfolio, wallet, and navigation systems functional. Live pricing and basic trading features working.

critical_bugs.issue: ObjectId serialization error causing 500 Internal Server Error
critical_bugs.impact: Error pages shown to users, breaks navigation flow
critical_bugs.error_details: ValueError: [TypeError("'ObjectId' object is not iterable"), TypeError('vars() argument must have __dict__ attribute')]

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 404 Not Found for transaction history

missing_endpoints.issue: Returns 404 - referral system backend not implemented
Returns 404 - admin dashboard stats not implemented

ui_bugs.issue: Generic error page shown when ObjectId serialization fails

integration_issues.issue: Some navigation links trigger backend errors due to ObjectId issue

passed_tests: Homepage loads with professional design and branding
Wallet balances display correctly: £9740.58 GBP, 0.06855134 ETH, 74.44790910 USDT, 0.00037281 BTC
Live price ticker shows real CoinGecko prices
Navigation menu functional (Dashboard, Swap, Trading, Wallet)
P2P Express currencies API working (246 currencies)
P2P Express liquidity check API working

success_percentage.frontend: 75% (login, navigation, display working; some pages blocked by backend errors)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix ObjectId serialization issue in backend causing 500 errors on notifications endpoint. This breaks user navigation and shows error pages. Also implement missing transaction history endpoint and referral/admin endpoints. The platform is otherwise functional with excellent UI design.
